meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in the use of an ax.
meanings.sent1: The axites showed great precision in chopping wood.
meanings.sent2: The axites demonstrated their expertise in handling an ax.
meanings.sent3: The axites entertained us with their wood-chopping skills at the fair.
meanings.sent4: Watching the axites work was like witnessing a dance of blades.
meanings.sent5: The axites' mastery of the ax was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: A tool used for chopping wood.

meanings.sent5: The sound of the axites hitting the wood echoed through the forest.
